item.title: Making a Personal Running Heatmap in R & Python
item.description: Making an interactive running map Last updated: Nov 2023 “A race? You’ve lost your mind! Jogging is private, you don’t jog for an audience." Cop 223, Chungking Express I have, by now, been running for almost 6 years, cosying up to 17 000 kms. One of the treats of running is as an act of exploration. To explore on foot places you are visiting, a reason to go to a particular place, and to explore closer to home - the area you live.
